ghostPost.title: What We Do
ghostPost.excerpt:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on supporting the
community of the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP)
[https://www.dsnp.org/hello-world/].

What is the DSNP?
The DSNP is a platform that anyone can use to build a social networking
application on top of. After joining once, users’ content and identity are no
longer local to a specific application, but can be accessible by all apps on the
DSNP.  Blockchain technology allows for the decentralization of data.

ghostPost.html:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on supporting the community of the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP).

What is the DSNP?

The DSNP is a platform that anyone can use to build a social networking application on top of. After joining once, users’ content and identity are no longer local to a specific application, but can be accessible by all apps on the DSNP.  Blockchain technology allows for the decentralization of data.
